oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kentucky State Monument, Chickamauga Park, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted and enhanced photograph of the Kentucky State Monument located at Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park. The postcard mentions Chattanooga, but the monument is actually located in Chickamauga, Georgia. Features a white border, divided back, and narrative on reverse. [No. 5822]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Chickamauga (Ga.); Walker County (Ga.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National parks & reserves; Monuments & memorials
